data.eml:eml: A new circumscription of the genus Varicellaria (Pertusariales, Ascomycota)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmitt, Imke, Otte, Juergen, Parnmen, Sittiporn, Sadowska-Des, Anna D., Luecking, Robert, Lumbsch, H. Thorsten (2012): A new circumscription of the genus Varicellaria (Pertusariales, Ascomycota). MycoKeys 4: 23-36, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.4.3545, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.4.3545
